page.title: 05HOME ENERGY PLAYINGPLACE/KEA
page.content: Varied sources of energy are used.Mains{electricity}is the most common source and is used for cooking, heating and lighting. The open fireplace is more often for decoration than use but some people use{solid fuels}for central heating. Town{gas}is not yet piped to our area but is regarded as the cheapest form of heating and cooking. Very occasionly{bottled gas}and {paraffin}are used for heating. Now that{oil}is so expensive not many people use it. Four houses have {solar panels}to obtain free hot water. Outside the house{electricity}is used for small tools(mowers) whereas petrol is used for larger ones (diggers).Cars and lorries use petrol or diesel, a few, electricity.Wind power is used for pumping water and sailing.
